name: Krify Software Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
description:
Krify is a bespoke mobile applications and software services provider based in Chigwell, UK and India. Creating value for our clients is our passion and software technology is our forte. Our core competency include Mobile app, Web, Wearable app development and digital marketing services. Krify extends its services into quality testing, content development, PR, SEO, etc. 
Client is the first priority for Krify. We work on the principle of collaborative and coordinated development.
We have successfully accomplished the development of 350+ applications in various domains including cloud integration that were deployed on popular app stores of Apple, Google and Windows.
As a result of our innovative ideas and committed efforts, recently one of our Pioneer Business Application developed for our premium UK client has won CIR Business Continuity Award 2016 as the 'Most Innovative Product of the Year'.
One of our product ‘Invisible Brace Scan’, have also been featured in BBC Radio for its innovative idea.
